Description: Marketo's powerful marketing automation software helps marketers master the art & science of digital marketing to engage customers and prospects.
Name: Marketo

Methods.Name: Create Export Job - Activities
Methods.Description: Creates an activity export job.

Methods.Name: Create Export Job - New Leads
Methods.Description: Creates an export job for leads created since the last run.

Methods.Name: Get Export File
Methods.Description: Retrieves a completed export file's content.

Methods.Name: Create Export Job - Leads
Methods.Description: Creates a lead export job.

Methods.Name: List Export Jobs
Methods.Description: Returns a list of export jobs created in the past 7 days.

Methods.Name: Get Export Job Status
Methods.Description: Retrieves the status for an export job.

Methods.Name: Cancel Export Job
Methods.Description: Cancels an export job.

Methods.Name: Enqueue Export Job
Methods.Description: Adds an export job to the processing queue.

Methods.Name: Create Export Job - New Activities
Methods.Description: Creates an export job for activities created since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Lists
Methods.Description: Lists all the static lists.

Methods.Name: Get List
Methods.Description: Gets a static list.

Methods.Name: Remove Lead From List
Methods.Description: Removes a lead or leads from a static list

Methods.Name: Get List Members
Methods.Description: Gets the members of a Static List.

Methods.Name: Add Lead To List
Methods.Description: Adds a lead or leads to a static list.

Methods.Name: List Activity Types
Methods.Description: Lists activity types.

Methods.Name: List Updated Leads
Methods.Description: Lists leads updated since last run.

Methods.Name: List Lead Memberships
Methods.Description: Lists a leads memberships.

Methods.Name: List Lead Activities
Methods.Description: Lists a lead's activities.

Methods.Name: Create Or Update Leads
Methods.Description: Creates or updates leads (batch).

Methods.Name: List Lead Changes
Methods.Description: Lists data value changes and new lead activities after the given datetime.

Methods.Name: Create Or Update Lead
Methods.Description: Creates or updates a lead, for use with a single lead.

Methods.Name: List Leads
Methods.Description: Lists all leads using a filter.

Methods.Name: List Updated Lead Activities
Methods.Description: Lists the lead activities updated since the specified date.

Methods.Name: List Lead Website And Email History
Methods.Description: Lists a leads website and email history.

Methods.Name: List New Lead Changes
Methods.Description: Lists data value changes and new lead activities since the last run.

Methods.Name: Get Lead
Methods.Description: Gets a lead.

Methods.Name: List Leads By Email Address
Methods.Description: Gets all of the leads with the specified email address.

Methods.Name: List Smart Campaigns
Methods.Description: Lists the smart campaigns of a lead.

Methods.Name: List Lead Fields
Methods.Description: Returns a list of all fields available for interaction via the REST API.

Methods.Name: List Program Members
Methods.Description: Retrieve a list of program members.

Methods.Name: Describe Program Member
Methods.Description: Retrieve metadata about program member objects.

Methods.Name: Get Import Job Failures
Methods.Description: Retrieves a list of failures for an import job.

Methods.Name: Create Import Job
Methods.Description: Creates an import job for a csv payload into the target instance.

Methods.Name: Get Import Job Status
Methods.Description: Retrieves the status for an import job.

Methods.Name: Get Import Job Warnings
Methods.Description: Retrieves a list of warnings for an import job.

Methods.Name: List Linkable Custom Objects
Methods.Description: Lists linkable custom objects and their fields.

Methods.Name: Create Custom Objects
Methods.Description: Creates a custom object.

Methods.Name: List Custom Objects
Methods.Description: Lists the API name of existing custom objects.

Methods.Name: Update Lead Custom Object
Methods.Description: Updates a leads custom object. Custom Object mappings must be added as custom fields.

Methods.Name: Create Custom Object Values
Methods.Description: Creates a custom objects values. Insert custom object fields under "[input].<CustomObjectField>".

Methods.Name: Upsert Custom Object Values
Methods.Description: Creates or updates a custom objects values. Insert custom object fields under "[input].<CustomObjectField>".

Methods.Name: Update Custom Object Values
Methods.Description: Updates a custom objects values. Insert custom object fields under "[input].<CustomObjectField>".

Methods.Name: List Users
Methods.Description: Retrieve a list of all user records. Required Permissions: Access User Management Api and Access Users
